TopicTitle: Configuration for More Planets/moons in RSS

Articles.Content:
Is there a config file and or textures for an RSS extension? Particularly interested in dwarf planets, and moons of Uranus and Neptune.

I found this:

http://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/1r3j8v/real_solar_system_mod_sample_planet_configuration/

but it's very outdated, and I was having lots of trouble getting it to work with 0.90 (PlanetFactory causing most of the problems)

Are there updated configs for this?
I know outerplanets kinda does this, but OPM is meant for the regular game, not RSS
